DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Clinical Study investigate effect electrical stimulation chronic low back pain .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥ 18 year , ≤65 year 2 . Chronic Low Back Pain first occurrence > 90 day prior enrolment , last relatively painfree time > 90 day prior enrolment . 3 . Continuing low back pain despite > 90 day medical management 4 . Oswestry Disability Index score ≥25 % ≤60 % time enrolment 5 . Able understand sign Informed Consent form . 6 . Ability comply instruction use operate ReActiv8 , comply Clinical Investigation Plan . 7 . Suitable ReActiv8 surgery determine implant physician prior inclusion . 8 . Prior week average Low Back Pain NRS ≥6.0 ≤9.0 11 point NRS scale ( 010 ) Baseline Visit 1 . BMI > 35 2 . Back Pain characteristic : 1 . Any surgical correction procedure scoliosis time , current clinical diagnosis scoliosis . 2 . Lumbar spine stenosis , define anteriorposterior diameter spinal canal < 10mm subject low extremity pain 3 . Neurological deficit possibly associate back pain ( e.g . foot drop ) . 4 . Back pain due pelvic visceral reason ( e.g . : endometriosis fibroid ) infection ( e.g . : post herpetic neuralgia ) . 5 . Back pain due inflammation damage spinal cord adjacent structure ( e.g . arachnoiditis syringomyelia ) 3 . Any current indication back surgery accord local institutional guideline , indication back surgery undergo surgery reason . 4 . Leg pain describe bad back pain , radiculopathy ( neuropathic pain ) knee . 5 . Source pain sacroiliac joint determine Investigator . 6 . Drug use 7 . Surgical procedure exclusion 8 . Any prior diagnosis lumbar vertebral compression fracture , lumbar par fracture , lumbar annular tear disc protrusion 9 . Planned surgery . 10 . Comorbid chronic pain condition 11 . Other clinical condition 12 . Psychosocial exclusion 13 . Protocol Compliance Exclusions 14 . General exclusion
